Plot.
Mr. Peabody: Scientist, 2 time Olympian, Business Titan, Inventor, and 
genius, wins the right to adopt Sherman; an eight year old boy who on his 
first day in school bites fellow student Penny Peterson during History 
Class over an argument about George Washington's life. After things get 
out of hand, Mr. Peabody invites Penny and her parents to his penthouse in 
New York for a dinner party. After an awkward 10 minutes or so Sherman 
reluctantly shows Penny 'The Wayback' a time machine Mr. Peabody himself 
invented. Penny and Sherman end up in Ancient Egypt where King Tut wants 
to marry Penny! Sherman goes to back to get Mr. Peabody to save them and 
together the trio have to get back to the present day with limited power 
and before Penny's parents realize they are gone!
